title: ​​The Two Minutes That Made Traders Lose Faith in the Gas Market
description: From an erroneous trading halt to speculation about “banging the close,” the US gas market is showing signs of strain
content: From an erroneous trading halt to speculation about “banging the close,” the US gas market is showing signs of strain
